newsArray.title: Bazballers didn’t save Test cricket, they’ve disrespected what makes it great and paid the price
newsArray.description: There’s a moment every sporting philosophy reaches its breaking point. For the England cricket team, that moment arrived somewhere between sitting seventh place on the World Test Championship table and yet another series that felt less like genuine competition and more like a farewell tour of Australia. A chance for all Aussie and English fans [...]
creator: samuel bernard

newsArray.title: Rob Key backs McCullum, Stokes to lead England out of Ashes darkness
newsArray.description: England's managing director Rob Key backed coach Brendon McCullum and skipper Ben Stokes despite the 0-3 Ashes loss in Australia. He admitted preparations were inadequate but believes the duo can help the team evolve and turn things around.
creator: asianet news central

newsArray.title: England's Ashes break in Noosa under scrutiny over player conduct
newsArray.description: Rob Key, England's managing director, will investigate reports of excessive drinking by players during a mid-Ashes break in Noosa. Key called such behaviour 'unacceptable' for an international cricket side after the trip was compared to a 'stag do'.
creator: asianet news central

newsArray.title: Wounded England must salvage more than pride in MCG Boxing Day Ashes Test
newsArray.description: Can McCullum’s ‘horse-whispering’ still register against a rampant Australia hungry for a series whitewash?The world famous Boxing Day Test awaits England’s beaten cricketers and we are about to discover whether the mighty coliseum that is the Melbourne Cricket Ground becomes their arena of the unwell; whether pride can be salvaged or it is just another stepping stone for Australia in their pursuit of an Ashes whitewash.Last year a record 373,691 spectators passed through the turnstiles across five days as Australia overcame India in a slow-burn thriller. This fourth Ashes Test was tipped to top that remarkable figure potentially but that will hinge on it similarly going the distance. It also needs the locals to be energised still by a series that has already been won by their team – even if simply beating the old enemy is usually enough. Continue reading...
creator: ali martin in melbourne

newsArray.title: আধার কার্ড জাল করে ভিন রাজ্যের ব্যাটারকে খেলানোর অভিযোগ বঙ্গ ক্রিকেটে, চাঞ্চল্য
newsArray.description: Bengal cricket news: আধার কার্ড সহ সরকারি নথি জাল করে সিএবি ও কলকাতা পুরসভা পরিচালিত মেয়র্স কাপে খেলার অভিযোগ উঠল মুম্বইয়ের এক তরুণ ক্রিকেটারের বিরুদ্ধে। আর তার সঙ্গেই নাম জড়ালো সেই স্কুলের দায়িত্বে থাকা কোচ আকবরের।
creator: eeron roy barman

newsArray.title: Nepal has a very good chance in T20 World Cup qualifiers: Coach Pathak
newsArray.description: New Nepal women's cricket coach Harshal Jayant Pathak is 'very much optimistic' about the team's chances in the T20 World Cup 2026 qualifiers, citing home advantage in Kathmandu, player improvement, and passionate local fan support.

newsArray.title: Virat Kohli's captaincy a 'disappointment', says Tom Moody: Harbhajan
newsArray.description: Former cricketers Harbhajan Singh and Tom Moody have criticized Virat Kohli's white-ball captaincy, calling it a 'disappointment' for failing to win trophies. However, AB de Villiers defended Kohli, stating such judgments are 'unfair'.
